Title: Requires that license plates be inspected during vehicle safety inspections and waives fees for the issuance of certain license plates
Summary: Requires that license plates be inspected during vehicle safety inspections and waives fees for the issuance of certain license plates.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring that license plates be inspected during safety inspections and waiving fees for the issuance of certain license plates
